New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his 50th and 51st home runs of the season.
Shohei Ohtani recorded his 50th stolen base of the season.
Shohei Ohtani went 6-for-6 with three home runs and ten RBI, considered one of the greatest offensive displays in MLB history.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a double and stole third base in the first inning.
Ohtani hit a RBI single and a two-run double in the second and third innings.
Ohtani hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning.
Ohtani hit his 50th home run of the season in the seventh inning.
Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: MLB Commissioner Rob Manfred congratulated Shohei Ohtani on his remarkable achievement.
The Los Angeles Dodgers secured their place in the playoffs with the 20-4 win over the Miami Marlins.
